now in order to understand these

from the car
so that you can bring in new air new

well the problem is this exhaust has

well they use a pre cat and a main cat
there's two different catalytic

drawn and the reason being is that this

just started your car everything's cold
the exhaust is cold so all those harmful

that doesn't solve all the problems and

it's basically just as good as we can

where do they place that pre catalytic
converter they can place it before the

now if they place it before that's ideal
for the pre catalytic converter because
it means it's getting those hot exhaust
gases immediately out of your exhaust

restriction before your turbo and it's
also taking some of the energy before it

catalytic converter after the
turbocharger that way your turbocharger

you get good response from the engine
unfortunately this turbocharger takes

into useful work to create boost for

your pre catalytic come
is going to receive cooler exhaust and

way you have to choose one of these if

of a boost and another thing that this

back pressure within this exhaust which
is going to build up the pressure
between the turbo and the exhaust and in

because that hot exhaust remains in the

they're heating up that cylinder so
you're gonna have more likelihood for
running into engine knock as a result
you get less boost and as a result you
have to pull timing and you make way

so Koenigseggs very first patent which I

it's how this design forces the air to

to flow around this pre catalytic

it's always gonna work it just passes
through it's a static system that you

don't want to run it hard yet while
you're first starting up that car then
the exhaust is going to be closed off
from the turbocharger and instead forced

the pre catalytic converter bypassing
the turbocharger and then through the

be wondering we'll wait a minute what if
I want power from the get-go well first
of all you shouldn't be driving your car

so I think the system is very clever in
that it's only going to be really used

I'm sure if you were to floor it because

catalytic
murder and all of your exhaust then

which is sized appropriately for this

the main catalytic converter does its

they would have about 1.3 more of
pressure less than the intake manifold
in the exhaust manifold versus
traditionally if you were to do this you

that having a higher pressure on this
